name: Groupees Chat Supplement
description: A simple userstyle for a better Groupees Chat user experience for Firefox and Chrome. Also can be use in conjunction with my Chat Dark Theme.
additional_info: Completely remove everyone you blocked on Groupees Chat. No more seeing "[Insert_Name_Here] said something". If you ever need to unblock them, uncheck/disable this userstyle and their name will reappear. Simple enable/disable just two mouse clicks away. Release notes V1.0 - 26 October 2015 -Initial Release
